name: The OG
description: A classic taco with seasoned ground beef, shredded lettuce, pico de gallo, cheddar jack cheese, and creamy BOHO sauce on a warm tortilla.

name: El Pastor
description: Traditional marinated pork, slow-roasted and served on a warm tortilla with sweet pineapple, fresh onion, and cilantro.

name: The Borracho
description: Crispy beer-battered fish served on a warm tortilla with a refreshing slaw and a smoky chipotle crema.

name: Down South
description: A Southern-inspired taco with crispy fried chicken, refreshing slaw, and creamy BOHO sauce on a warm tortilla.

name: Carne Asada
description: Tender, marinated grilled steak, chopped and served simply on a warm tortilla with fresh onion and cilantro.

name: Veg Out
description: A delicious vegetarian taco with seasoned black beans, corn, refreshing slaw, and a smoky chipotle crema.

name: Carnitas
description: Tender, slow-cooked shredded pork with crispy edges, served on a warm tortilla with fresh onion and cilantro.

name: Chicken Tinga
description: Flavorful shredded chicken stewed in a smoky chipotle-tomato sauce, served on a warm tortilla with fresh onion and cilantro.

name: Chips & Salsa
description: A basket of fresh, crispy fried corn tortillas served with our signature house-made salsa.

name: Chips & Guac
description: A basket of fresh, crispy fried corn tortillas served with a generous portion of our house-made guacamole.

name: Chips & Queso
description: A basket of fresh, crispy fried corn tortillas served with a bowl of our warm, creamy house-made queso.

name: Mexican Street Corn
description: A cup of sweet corn kernels mixed with cotija cheese, cilantro, and creamy BOHO sauce.

name: Quesadilla
description: A large flour tortilla filled with melted cheddar jack cheese and grilled to perfection. Add any of our proteins for an extra charge.

name: Loaded Nachos
description: A mountain of fried corn tortillas loaded with warm queso, pico de gallo, jalapenos, and a drizzle of chipotle crema. Add protein for an extra charge.

name: Burrito/Bowl
description: Your choice of protein wrapped in a flour tortilla or served in a bowl with rice, beans, shredded lettuce, pico de gallo, and cheddar jack cheese.

name: Horchata
description: A traditional, sweet Mexican drink made from rice milk and flavored with cinnamon and vanilla.

name: Mexican Coke
description: Coca-Cola made with real cane sugar, served in its iconic glass bottle for a classic, crisp taste.

name: Jarritos
description: An authentic Mexican fruit-flavored soda in a glass bottle. Ask for available flavors like Mandarin, Tamarind, or Lime.

name: Water
description: A simple bottle of purified spring water.
